translation.en: I don't wanna have a blue butt!
I can turn you back if you give me the box!
translation.es: ¡Puedo convertirte en humano si me das la caja!

translation.en: You'll get a big box of nothing!
translation.es: ¡No te voy a dar ninguna caja!

translation.en: Like a shadow in the night, the Zucchini approaches his prey
translation.es: Cual sombra en la noche, Zucchini se acerca a su presa

translation.en: with all the predatory instincts and stealth of--
translation.es: con el instinto predador y el sigilo de...

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, it's sleepy time for Brocky- poo.
translation.es: Si me disculpan, es hora de la siesta para Brocky.
Me sorprende lo fácil que fue eso.

translation.en: Another victory for the magnificent Zucchini!
So dashing, so daring, so mascu--
translation.es: Tan apuesto, tan intrépido, tan mascu...

translation.en: - Excellent. - He is not your nephew.
If he's not my nephew, why bring him here, you fumbling feather brain?
translation.es: Si no es mi sobrino, ¿por qué lo trajiste, fantoche flojo?

translation.en: But these are useless, you second- rate simpleton!
translation.es: Pero estas no sirven, zonzo simplón.

translation.en: Ah! The nerve of him. After all I've done for that boy.
translation.es: Descarado. Después de todo lo que hice por él.

translation.en: I should never have let my little Zoe marry that circus freak.
translation.es: No debí dejar que mi pequeña Zoe se casara con ese loco del circo.

translation.en: Now that's a fine go- getter.
- Uh... you, what are you doing here? - I was--
- Have you seen Brock? - No, sir.
- He should be here somewhere. - But I was hoping that--
translation.es: - Debería estar por aquí. - Quería ver si...

translation.en: Brock! Where is that man? Brock!
I have something important that I need to tell you,
and I... I... I demand that you listen to me!
Now sit your butt in that chair and listen up!
translation.es: Ahora siente el trasero en esa silla ¡y escuche!

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. What is wrong with you?
- You almost gave me a heart attack! - That had to be scary. Sorry.
Okay, but change back and tell me what happened with my father.
translation.es: Vuelve a la normalidad y dime qué pasó con mi padre.

translation.en: - Um... - You quit? Yeah. I totally did. It was great.
- Thank you. - We're going to be so happy.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Vamos a ser muy felices.

translation.en: It has to be in here somewhere!
I looked like 100 times. It's not--
translation.es: Ya busqué como cien veces. No está.

translation.en: - Trust me. What? No! They-- - Try this one.
Maybe there's just too many cookies to see it!
translation.es: Tal vez hay demasiadas para verla.

translation.en: Maybe eat some more to clear up some space.
translation.es: Hay que comer para hacer lugar.

translation.en: - Try this one. - The box always stays full.
Maybe not, if you eat faster. You've got to eat faster!
translation.es: Tal vez no si comes más rápido.

translation.en: Please eat faster! Please eat faster!
Zoe! Zoe! Stop! It's not here!
Look, the box keeps adding new animals, but not new human cookies.
translation.es: Mira... La caja sigue agregando animales, pero no galletas humanas.

translation.en: There's only one of those, and it's gone, Zoe.
translation.es: Solo hay... Solo hay una de esas, - y desapareció, Zoe. - No.

translation.en: No, I will not accept that.
There's got to be a way to get you human again.
translation.es: Debe haber una forma de que vuelvas a ser humano.

translation.en: - Zoe-- - In the meantime, we're just gonna tough it out, gonna make it work.
translation.es: - Zoe... - Mientras tanto, vamos a aguantar.

translation.en: I mean, how hard can it be?
translation.es: Es decir, ¿qué tan difícil puede ser?

translation.en: I hold it to be true.
What happened to you? You eat a bad banana?
I know it's been hard these last couple weeks.
translation.es: Sé que las últimas semanas han sido difíciles.

translation.en: Not being human and all, spending your life without opposable thumbs.
translation.es: Esto de no ser humano y pasarse la vida sin pulgares oponibles.

translation.en: - Shunned by the entire-- - You're not helping.
translation.es: - El mundo te da... - Eso no ayuda.

translation.en: You're shedding everywhere, shunned by the entire world.
translation.es: Llenas todo de pelo, el mundo te da la espalda.

translation.en: - Okay. - But look at the bright side!
translation.es: - Bueno. - Pero mira el lado positivo.

translation.en: You and Zoe brought life back to this circus.
translation.es: Tú y Zoe le devolvieron la vida a este circo.

translation.en: You've not only brought our circus family together,
translation.es: No solo reuniste a nuestra familia del circo,

translation.en: but you've brought tons of other families together
translation.es: sino que reuniste a miles de familias

translation.en: to laugh and cheer and eat overpriced cotton candy.
translation.es: para que se diviertan y compren algodón de azúcar carísimo.

translation.en: That's gotta count for something, right?
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Eso tiene que servir para algo.
Estás haciendo feliz a la gente.
Los payasos son pésimos para mentir.

translation.en: - What are you-- - I've just come to talk, my boy.
Just a moment of your time.
Oh, yes, the grand re- opening
of Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus.
translation.es: del Increíble Circo de Animales de Buffalo Bob.

translation.en: Odd that you kept my brother's name.
translation.es: Es raro que mantuvieras el nombre de mi hermano.

translation.en: Because it was his circus. What do you want, Horatio?
translation.es: Porque era su circo. ¿Qué quieres, Horatio?

translation.en: I have a proposal for you.
What could you have that I would possibly--
I'm offering you a chance to become human again.
translation.es: Te ofrezco la oportunidad de volver a ser humano.

translation.en: Wouldn't want me to crush it to bits, would you?
Just tell me what you want for it?
translation.es: Solo dime qué quieres a cambio.

translation.en: Why, my boy, I simply want what was rightfully mine.
translation.es: Tan solo quiero lo que me corresponde por derecho.

translation.en: - What? - Once I have those animal crackers--
The circus is no good without them, is it?
translation.es: El circo no sirve sin las galletas, ¿no?

translation.en: I'll only make this offer once.
translation.es: Solo te haré esta oferta una vez.

translation.en: Well, that's how the cookie crumbles.
translation.es: No querrás que te devuelva unas migajas.

translation.en: - Human again. - Think of your family, Owen.
translation.es: - Humano otra vez. - Piensa en tu familia, Owen.

translation.en: What would they want you to do?
Do you think they want a filthy beast for a husband?
translation.es: ¿Crees que quieren una bestia sucia como esposo...

translation.en: Yes, yes, your family. Now, do we have a deal?
translation.es: Sí, tu familia. Entonces, ¿tenemos un trato?

translation.en: Do you wish to remain a wretched animal for the rest of your life?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ser un animal miserable toda la vida?

translation.en: If being a wretched animal lets me keep my family together,
translation.es: Si ser un animal miserable me permite mantener a mi familia unida,

translation.en: - then, yeah, sign me up. - Oh!
Because I'll be a gorilla or a horse or a rhinoceros
translation.es: Porque seré un gorila, un caballo, un rinoceronte

translation.en: or whatever filthy beast I have to be
translation.es: o cualquier bestia sucia que deba ser
para mantener unida a mi familia.

translation.en: I was afraid you would have too much of my brother in you.
translation.es: Temí que te parecieras demasiado a mi hermano.

translation.en: It seems we'll have to do this the hard way.
translation.es: Parece que tendremos que hacerlo por las malas.

translation.en: Apparently, one does not need to eat the entire animal cracker
translation.es: Aparentemente, no es necesario comerse toda la galleta de animalitos

translation.en: to assume the attributes of said animal.
translation.es: para adoptar los atributos de dicho animalito.

translation.en: - Get off me. - After all, a deal is a deal.
translation.es: - Suéltenme. - Un trato es un trato.

translation.en: And I would rather not deal with an 800- pound gorilla.
translation.es: Y prefiero no tener tratos con un gorila de 400 kilos.

translation.en: Yes, I would rather deal with pathetic little you.
translation.es: Sí, prefiero tratar con un ser patético como tú.

translation.en: Hey, what's all the barking about?
Now, attention acrobats, jugglers, stage hands, clowns.
I would like to announce the immediate takeover of this circus.
translation.es: Quisiera anunciar la adquisición inmediata de este circo.

translation.en: As of this moment, you are all fired.
translation.es: Desde este momento, están todos despedidos.

translation.en: Nice work, Bulletman. Everybody grab a cookie!
translation.es: Buen trabajo, Hombre Bala. ¡Todos tomen una galleta!

translation.en: Is that the best you got? Hey, Stabby, my turn!
translation.es: ¿Es lo mejor que tienes? ¡Oye, Stabby! Es mi turno.

translation.en: Why did you drag me here? You know how I feel about the--
translation.es: ¿Para qué me trajiste? ¿Sabes lo que opino de...?

translation.en: That bunny rabbit turtle thing just got drop- kicked by a duck- billed platypus!
translation.es: ¡A aquel conejo-tortuga lo acaba de patear un ornitorrinco!
Y yo te tengo a ti.
Lo siento, Horatio, pero no puedo...

translation.en: You lack the vision to truly create something the world has never seen.
translation.es: Les falta la visión para crear algo que el mundo no haya visto jamás.

translation.en: but I... I will use them to rule the world!
translation.es: Pero yo... ...las usaré para dominar el mundo.

translation.en: - Robert? - You must stop this madness!
But I thought you were both killed.
translation.es: Pero pensé que los dos estaban muertos.

translation.en: Not killed, but we can never be human again.
translation.es: Muertos no, pero no podremos volver a ser humanos.

translation.en: You see, that fire you started destroyed our human cookies.
translation.es: El incendio que provocaste destruyó nuestras galletas humanas.

translation.en: what's in the past is in the past.

translation.es: Pero mira a tu alrededor, hermano.

translation.en: Is this really how you want to be seen?
translation.es: ¿Es así como quieres que te vean?

translation.en: How you want to live your life? Like this?
Better this than a broken- down old man, Robert.
translation.es: Mejor así que como un viejo cansado.

translation.en: Don't eat this until after I fire you.
translation.es: No te la comas hasta que dispare.

translation.en: Hello, my little monkey Mackenzie darling.
Do you not see the utter futility of your endeavors, boy?
translation.es: ¿No ves la completa inutilidad de tus esfuerzos, muchacho?

translation.en: Can you not smell the destruction of all you know and love?
translation.es: ¿No puedes oler la destrucción de todo lo que conoces y amas?

translation.en: It has to be somewhere. Come on. Zoe?
Unhand me this instant, you over- muscled oaf!
I hold it true, what e'er befall.
translation.es: Creo, teniendo en cuenta este dolor,

translation.en: I feel it when I sorrow most.
translation.es: y cuando ya más no me puedo afligir,

translation.en: 'Tis better to have loved and lost
translation.es: que es mejor primero amar y después sufrir

translation.en: How will we ever top this performance?
You ate the broken pieces, you doofuses!
That means you have broken pieces in the box.
translation.es: Eso significa que hay pedazos rotos en la caja.

translation.en: It's gonna take time to figure out who's who.
translation.es: Tomará tiempo saber quién es quién.

translation.en: You want his arm and his leg on your body?
translation.es: ¿Quieres su brazo y su pierna en tu cuerpo?

translation.en: Take your time. The Zucchini can wait.
translation.es: Tómate tu tiempo. Zucchini puede esperar.

translation.en: Do you not know what I am?
- We did it, Zoe. - We did.
Aw. Just wish my dad could've--
- Dad? - I saw what you two did out there.
That whole changing into animals thing!
Owen, I'm so sorry for the way I've treated you.
translation.es: Owen, lamento mucho la forma en que te traté.

translation.en: You're no nincompoop, quite the opposite.
translation.es: No eres un bobalicón. Todo lo contrario.

translation.en: And, Zoe, you are an amazing woman.
translation.es: Y tú, Zoe, eres una mujer increíble.

translation.en: But, of course, I've always known that.
- Grandpa! - Ha- ha! Hey, there, little monkey!
Guess what, Grandpa. I'm in the circus!
translation.es: ¡A que no sabes! ¡Estoy en el circo!

translation.en: In it? You're gonna be the star!
Let's go get you cleaned up.
So, it turns out Binkley is precisely the genius you said she was.
translation.es: Resulta que Binkley es la genia que dijiste que era.
Binkley sí que era una genia.

translation.en: Wait till you see what she came up with.
translation.es: Esperen a ver lo que se le ocurrió.

translation.en: - They just went on sale minutes ago. - Uh, what went on sale?
translation.es: Las acaban de poner a la venta. ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: Remember those dog biscuits that turned our skin crazy colors?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas las galletas que te cambiaban de color?

translation.en: - I think I threw up on your shoes. - Oof.
Binkley found a way to turn those failed experiments
Oh, so what do they do?
Look at them. They're having a blast!
But, I mean, how will they change back?
We thought it best not to advertise that part.
translation.es: Pensamos que era mejor no promocionar esa parte.

translation.en: Wow, you still find it funny, I see. Still like it.
translation.es: Aún te parece gracioso. Te sigue gustando.

translation.en: Ha- ha! We're going to be rich, partner.
Partner?  I've never been one of those.
I mean, like in a game maybe, but not like in a business.
translation.es: Fui socia de un club, pero no de un negocio.

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy! Did you see me ride the pony?
She will be the star in no time.
translation.es: Será la estrella en poco tiempo.

translation.en: Look at you, my gypsy princess.
Do you want me to tell you your fortune?
I think I already know it.
Welcome to Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus!
translation.es: ¡Bienvenidos al Increíble Circo de Animales de Buffalo Bob!

translation.en: What's life without a little danger?
Ooh. Who is that guy? I like that guy.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es ese tipo? - Me gusta ese tipo.

translation.en: Prepare yourselves for something truly amazing!
Prepare yourself for something truly incredible!
Hey, and, you know, don't burn the place down.
translation.es: Y no vayas a prender fuego todo.

translation.en: ♪I'm living my patience and my motivation I put them on separate teams
translation.es: BASADA EN LA NOVELA GRÁFICA ANIMAL CRACKERS DE SCOTT CHRISTIAN SAVA
